author: morciuch
msg: Added a new goal, jetspeed:war, for creating a custom .war using jetspeed's binary distribution (product of dist:build-bin goal). Work in progress, maven plugin documentation is not up to date.

author: morciuch
msg: 1. Sample Hypersonic database is now pre-populated with psml (see Bugzilla bug# 17290).
2. Fixed problem with PSML Browser not localizing under db psml manager, patch by Fabio Latrofa (see Bugzilla bug# 18555).
3. Updated sample sites page with www.javacrawl.com portal.
